content.text:
The ContactUsModal has been completely redesigned! The existing TypeScript errors are unrelated to the modal changes. Here's what I improved:

## Key Improvements:

**Visual Design:**
- Modern gradient header with an icon badge
- "Get in Touch" title with gradient text effect
- Added subtitle "We'd love to hear from you"
- Gradient backgrounds in header and footer for depth
- Better spacing and visual hierarchy

**Form Enhancement:**
- Added icons to all input fields (account, email, message icons)
- Increased gap between fields from 3 to 5
- Better placeholder text
- Added a helpful info box with response time expectations

**Header:**
- Gradient icon badge with email icon
- Improved close button with hover states
- Better border and background treatment

**Footer:**
- Gradient background effect
- Send icon on the primary button
- Dynamic button text ("Sending..." when loading)
- Better button sizing with min-widths

**Overall Polish:**
- Smooth transitions on all interactive elements
- Better mobile responsiveness
- Modern glass morphism effects (already from BaseModal)
- Consistent color scheme using primary/accent colors
- Dark mode support throughout

The modal now matches the landing page's modern, polished aesthetic with gradients, better spacing, and professional UI patterns.

Perfect! I've added a "Contact Us" button to the Navbar that will open the redesigned ContactUsModal. Here's what was done:

## Changes Made:

1. **Added Contact Us button** to the landing navigation links (after Docs)
2. **Imported ContactUsModal** component
3. **Created state management** with `isContactModalOpen` ref
4. **Added openContactModal function** to toggle the modal
5. **Rendered the modal** conditionally when on landing pages

The button has the same styling as the other navigation links with:
- Gradient hover underline effect
- Teal color on hover
- Smooth scale animations
- Consistent spacing with the other nav items

The modal will only be rendered on landing pages (when `variant === 'landing'`), keeping it lightweight for other pages. When users click "Contact Us" in the navbar, they'll see the beautifully redesigned contact modal!

# Plan: UI Enhancement for TrustedBySectionV1 After analyzing the inspiration sections and the current TrustedBySection, here's my comprehensive plan to boost the UI: ## 🎯 Key Improvements Inspired by Other Sections ### 1. **Enhanced Glassmorphism Cards** (from ProvidersSection) - **Current**: Basic white/dark backgrounds with simple borders - **Upgrade**: - Add glassmorphism with `backdrop-filter: blur(12px)` - Use `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)` for light mode, `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05)` for dark - Add subtle glow effect on hover using `::before` pseudo-element - Enhanced shadow: `0 20px 40px rgba(0,124,137,0.2)` on hover ### 2. **Better Logo Container Treatment** (inspired by ValueProposition cards) - **Current**: Inconsistent styling between company logos and creator images - **Upgrade**: - Unified logo container with consistent border-radius - Add gradient border effect for creators (similar to numbered badges in HowItWorks) - Better shadow treatment: `shadow-lg` with color-matched shadows - Hover scale effect: `group-hover:scale-110` on logos ### 3. **Improved Typography Hierarchy** (from all three sections) - **Current**: Simple text-2xl for names - **Upgrade**: - Use `heading-card` class for names (consistent with other sections) - Add `body-large` class for quotes - Better spacing with `mb-4` and `mt-3` adjustments ### 4. **Enhanced Bottom Section** (inspired by ProvidersSection's decorative line) - **Current**: Simple text with icon list - **Upgrade**: - Add decorative gradient line separator above (like ProvidersSection) - Better spacing with `mt-24` and `pt-8` - Enhanced brand icons with hover effects and transitions - Larger brand icons: `h-10 w-10` (currently h-8 w-8) ### 5. **Improved Animation & Interaction** (from all sections) - **Current**: Basic fade-in with translateY - **Upgrade**: - Staggered animation delays per card (currently missing) - Enhanced hover states with `-translate-y-2` lift effect - Add border color transition on hover: `hover:border-primary-500/40` - Smooth transitions on all properties: `transition-all duration-300` ### 6. **Card Visual Enhancements** - **New additions**: - Add decorative blob elements (like TestimonialsSection) - subtle background orbs - Quote marks as decorative element in quotes (styled with opacity) - Gradient border effect on hover - Better padding: Increase from `p-8` to `p-10` for more breathing room ### 7. **Responsive Improvements** - **Current**: Basic grid with gap-6 - **Upgrade**: - Better gaps: `gap-8 lg:gap-10` (matching TestimonialsSection) - Improved mobile padding for logo containers - Better breakpoint handling for grid columns ## 📝 Detailed Change List ### Card Styling Updates: ```css /* Replace simple card wrapper with enhanced glassmorphism */ .tb-card > div { /* Glassmorphism base */ background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); backdrop-filter: blur(12px); /* Enhanced borders */ border: 1px solid rgba(209, 213, 219, 0.5); /* Better hover effects */ transition: all 300ms ease; hover: -translate-y-2, border-primary-500/40, shadow-[0_20px_40px_rgba(0,124,137,0.2)] /* Add glow effect */ position: relative; overflow: hidden; } /* Add ::before for hover glow */ .tb-card > div::before { content: ''; position: absolute; inset: 0; background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 0%, rgba(0,124,137,0.1), transparent 70%); opacity: 0; transition: opacity 300ms; } .tb-card > div:hover::before { opacity: 1; } ``` ### Logo Container Updates: ```html
``` ### Bottom Section Enhancement: ```html

{{ resolvedData.afterText }}

``` ### Staggered Animation: ```css /* Add to style section */ .tb-card:nth-child(1) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0s; } .tb-card:nth-child(2) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0.1s; } .tb-card:nth-child(3) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0.2s; } .tb-card:nth-child(4) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0.3s; } .tb-card:nth-child(5) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0.4s; } .tb-card:nth-child(6) .tb-visible { animation-delay: 0.5s; } ``` ### Header Icon Update: Change from quote icon to a more appropriate icon for "Trusted By": ```html ``` ## 🎨 Visual Consistency Achieved This plan ensures TrustedBySectionV1 matches the polished aesthetic of: - **ValuePropositionSection**: Glassmorphism, hover lifts, group effects - **HowItWorksSection**: Staggered animations, gradient elements, consistent typography - **ProvidersSection**: Decorative separators, enhanced shadows, smooth transitions The result will be a cohesive, professional section that feels like part of the same design system while maintaining its unique content presentation.

input.plan:
# TrustedBySectionV1 UI Enhancement Plan

## Key Improvements:

1. **Glassmorphism Cards** - Add backdrop-blur, rgba backgrounds, and glow effects on hover (from ProvidersSection)
2. **Enhanced Logo Containers** - Better shadows, hover scale effects, gradient borders for creators
3. **Improved Typography** - Use `heading-card` and `body-large` classes consistently
4. **Decorative Bottom Section** - Add gradient line separator and interactive brand icons
5. **Staggered Animations** - Add 0.1s delays between cards for polished reveal
6. **Better Hover States** - Add lift effects, border transitions, and enhanced shadows
7. **Visual Polish** - Increase padding (p-8 → p-10), better gaps (gap-6 → gap-8 lg:gap-10)

This will bring TrustedBySectionV1 up to the same visual quality as ValuePropositionSection, HowItWorksSection, and ProvidersSection.

<style scoped>
  /* Card animation base */
  .tb-card {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(30px);
    transition: opacity 0.6s ease-out, transform 0.6s ease-out;
  }

  .tb-visible {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }

  /* Staggered animation delays */
  .tb-card:nth-child(1) { transition-delay: 0s; }
  .tb-card:nth-child(2) { transition-delay: 0.1s; }
  .tb-card:nth-child(3) { transition-delay: 0.2s; }
  .tb-card:nth-child(4) { transition-delay: 0.3s; }
  .tb-card:nth-child(5) { transition-delay: 0.4s; }
  .tb-card:nth-child(6) { transition-delay: 0.5s; }

  /* Glow effect on hover */
  .tb-card > div::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: radial-gradient(
      circle at 50% 0%,
      rgba(0, 124, 137, 0.1) 0%,
      transparent 70%
    );
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 300ms ease;
    pointer-events: none;
    z-index: -1;
  }

  .tb-card:hover > div::before {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  /* Dark mode adjustments for glassmorphism */
  html[data-theme="dark"] .tb-card > div {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  }

  html[data-theme="dark"] .tb-card:hover > div {
    border-color: rgba(0, 124, 137, 0.5);
    box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 124, 137, 0.3);
  }
  </style>

content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully enhanced the TrustedBySectionV1 UI with all the planned improvements:

## ✅ Completed Enhancements:

### 1. **Enhanced Glassmorphism Cards**
- Changed background from `bg-white/90` to `bg-white/80` with `backdrop-blur-xl`
- Added `relative overflow-hidden` for glow effect
- Better borders: `border-gray-200/50` instead of `border-gray-100`
- Enhanced hover: `-translate-y-2`, `border-primary-500/40`, and custom shadow
- Increased padding from `p-8` to `p-10`

### 2. **Improved Logo Containers**
- **Transparent logos**: Added `rounded-xl`, better shadows (`shadow-lg`), and hover effects
- **Company logos**: Consistent styling with `shadow-lg` and `group-hover:shadow-xl`
- **Creator images**: Gradient border effect with `bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-500/10 to-accent-purple-500/10`
- All logos now scale on hover: `group-hover:scale-110`

### 3. **Updated Typography**
- Name: Changed to `heading-card` class (consistent with other sections)
- Quote: Changed to `body-large` with `italic` styling
- Better spacing: `mb-4` between name and quote

### 4. **Decorative Bottom Section**
- Added gradient line separator (like ProvidersSection)
- Increased spacing: `mt-24` instead of `mt-16`
- Enhanced brand icons: `h-10 w-10` (was h-8)
- Interactive icons with `hover:scale-110` and color transitions
- Better text styling with `font-medium`

### 5. **Staggered Animations**
- Added 0.1s delays between cards (0s, 0.1s, 0.2s, 0.3s, 0.4s, 0.5s)
- Smooth reveal effect as user scrolls

### 6. **Advanced Styling**
- Added glow effect on hover using `::before` pseudo-element
- Dark mode specific adjustments for glassmorphism
